name: The Silent Hill Collection
summary: The Silent Hill Collection is a bundle which was released on Silent Hill movie world premiere's day. It includes three games: Silent Hill 2, Silent Hill 3 and Silent Hill 4: The Room. All three discs are placed in one DVD box, there is a manual for each game as well as The Silent Hill Experience advertisement inside. The japanese release of the collection was distributed exclusively through the Konamistyle.jp site, and includes the first Silent Hill in addition from the other games.
